title: The 5 Jerks
description: Meet the Five Pigeons of the Acapellapocalypse: Bad Boy, Meathead, Mystery Lad, Nice Guy, and Party Girl. If you thought you hated them in real life, you’re gonna love them in their own show!
quote: We’re not annoying. No, we are not annoying on TV!
alt2: Mystery Lad and Meathead in a popped hot tub, water splashing everywhere
alt3: Party Girl face down on the floor next to wooden debris; Bad Boy vandalizing a painting
alt4: Party Girl holding a boombox; Meathead break dancing
